title: The Dems’ Big Lie About January 6th (Ep 1793)
description:
In this episode, I address the letter sent by the Biden administration that shows they’re looking to attack the Second Amendment through end-arounds. I also address the Democrats’ failed January 6th strategy. 

News Picks:

Is the Biden administration preparing to restrict ammunition sales?

Is 2022 going to be an electoral fiasco for the Democrats?

The Biden administration was lying about the Ministry of Truth.

The Democrats’ identity politics agenda is collapsing, and it’s glorious.

UK General warns about a possible Third World War.


Stimulus checks rewired how some Americans see money.

DC has the worst economic equality by race in America: Study.
